title: Red Seas Fire - Exposition [2013] [320kbps]
description:
Red Seas Fire - 'Exposition'

Song names: 

1: Fortress
2: Turner & Hooch 
3: Of Motion
4: A Life We Used to Know


Firstly, THANK YOU! We really appreciate you taking the time to download our music, it was written and produced by a group of friends who love to make enjoyable and immersive songs, and in that respect we sincerely hope it brings you some of the feeling we get from bringing it to you.


The band thanks:
	
Brian, Janet and Rachel Graves. Nicole Lloyd. Penny, Richard, Hope and Tucker Fogarty. Peter, Kim and Jessica Dorsz. Mike, Yvette and Chris Adams. Chris Evans. Jonny Hunt. Joe Brown. Tess, Jerry, Bob, Skye and Mac. Adam Getgood. Jamie Walters. Sam Gates. Morgan Sinclair. Annie Wright. Tanya and Ruben Haskins Spellman. Liam John Byrne. Jonny Renshaw. Eduardo Apolonia. Paul Gough, and Zilla Cabs, Daniel Wagner (Ddub Designs). Tim Mills, Ben French and everyone at Bare Knuckle Pickups. Rich of High Five Touring. Maciej, Michael, Dawid and everyone at Mayones Guitars and Basses. Gavin at Regal Tip Sticks. Doug and Hugo at Darkglass Electronics. Andy, Matt and everyone at Matrix Amplification. WTPA.



Credits:

All music and lyrics written by Red Seas Fire.

Robin Adams - Vocals
Pete Graves - Guitar & Electronics
Leo Dorsz - Bass
Jake Fogarty - Drums

Annie Wright - Vocals on Of Motion courtesy of ForgetMeKnot.
Chris Evans - Violin on Turner & Hooch, Of Motion and A Life We Used to Know.

Vocals produced by Robin Adams.
Guitars and bass produced by Pete Graves.
Drums produced by Jonny Renshaw at Bandit Studios in Tetbury.
Guitars re-amped by Eduardo Apolonia.
Mixed and Mastered by Adam Getgood.
